1.content:
You proceeded to turn off the TV after finishing watching one of the many Disney Movies that you owned since you figured it was the best way to end your night. However, after putting the DVD away and putting back where it belonged you heard an odd noise from the TV. This prompted you to turn around though when you did you didn't see anything odd since the TV was still off.

This caused you to shrug your shoulders as it most likely was just you hearing things or something. But when you got up to walk away from the TV you felt yourself starting to get light headed for some odd reason. And before you knew it found yourself blacking out and falling down onto the floor.

-----------

You found yourself letting out a loud groan as you put a hand up to your head and muttered, "What happened?"

You then blinked a few times and found your eyes widening as you looked around and saw that you were no longer in your home anymore, or even in the real world anymore. But after taking a closer look around your surroundings you saw that you were in fact in the world of......
1.title: Where Am I?

choices: The forest. (Robin Hood and LIttle John will be your choices)
A old styled home. (The Sheriff of Nottingham's will be your choice.)
A castle. (Prince John or King Richard will be your choices)
A church. (Friar Tuck will be your choice. Yes, you're reading this right)
Other. (Not sure I forgot anyone, but better safe then sorry.)
11.content: You found your eyes widen in shocked after you had sat up and looked around at your surroundings to which you noticed that there was a medieval feel to everything. This led you to come to the conclusion that you had somehow ended up in the world from Disney's Robin Hood. However, once you had gotten up onto your feet and took a few steps around where you were it finally hit you that weren't just in the movie itself. But you were more specifically in.....
11.title: Robin Hood.

choices: front of the ZPD building. (Nick Wilde and a lot of other choices here)
front of a bakery in Bunnyburrow. (Gideon's bakery to be more specific)
the Rainforest District. (Manchas will be your choice here)
Tundratown (One of Mr. Big's Polar Bears will be your choices here)
in someone's room. (either Lionheart's room or one of the Tiger Dancer's room)
12.content: After you had gotten a better look around your surroundings you soon came to realize that you were in the world of Zootopia. But once you had gotten up onto your feet and had looked around while taking a few steps around the are you soon saw that you were more specifically in......
12.title: Zootopia, But Where?

choices: Lady and the tramp II: Scamp's adventure.
15.content: Okay how about these Disney movies?
15.title: Other.

152.content:
After you had gotten up off of the ground itself you realized you were somewhere in London England as you walked down the city's streets as everything itself was animated.

It was at that precise moment one of the movie's characters noticed you but who was it that noticed you?
152.title: 101 Dalmatians II: Patch's London Adventure.

choices: the studio. They need me over on the movie set."
the gym. I've got to keep myself in shape since I do play a superhero on TV."
before he can say anything a Doberman grabs you from behind and tries to mug you
1522.content:
You found yourself just staring in total shock as you saw a heavily muscled anthro German Shepard walking towards you who was wearing a short sleeve shirt and a pair of workout shorts along with a pair of sneakers and sunglases. But you knew that this anthro canine was in fact the movie star Thunderbolt, or at least that's what he was in the original film. However, considering that he was wearing sunglasses and was looking from left to right while he walked towards you this caused you to come to the conclusion that he was still a movie star even in this alternate universe.

And even though you wanted to ask yourslef how you ended up here you weren't able to since when the huge dog was in front of you, you saw him pull down his sunglasses and look down at you as he offered you a hand and asked, "Hey there, are you okay? I saw you in this alley so I got curious since I've never since someone like you before. Though I get the feeling you're from America just like me."

"Uh, y-yes, that's right I am. And my name is Peter, and I'm new here. And I admit that I did get lost." You replied, while you took his hand and he helped you upon onto your feet.

*Well it's nice to meet you Peter. The name's Thunderbolt, and I happen to be quite the successful actor. And you're in luck since I'm currently filming for a new episode for my show here:" The canine told you with a big grin on his face. Right after he had told you this this though you heard a buzzing noise coming from Thunderbolt's pocket. You then saw the anthro dog reach into it and pull out his phone. And after taking a look at it he then looked at you and said, "Erm sorry about this Peter, but my alarm just went off and I need to head to..."
1522.title: Thunderbolt

155.content: Okay so here are some more animal turned anthro Disney Movie choices. Which one will it be?
155.title: More Disney Movie Choices.

1551.content:
You took a look around your current surroundings and you saw that you weren't in your house anymore, but rather in a forest. This caused you to be quite perplexed as you weren't sure what to make of this. And sadly you were about to get even more confused when you heard a voice followed by some footsteps when it asked, "Hey, are you okay?"

You were about to reassure whoever asked that question that you were fine. But right when you were going to you found yourself just staring in total shock as your eyes went wide since you saw a well muscled anthro step out from the nearby brushes once he had gotten to where you were.

However, upon a closer look and remembering the voices of the characters you knew that the anthro standing in front of you was none other then.....
1551.title: The Fox And The Hound

1553.content: Here are some more Disney Movies to choose from since we still have a quite few more that have anthros in them.
1553.title: More Disney Movies.

15533.content: Here are a few more Disney movies just in case none have caught your attention as of yet. Though if these tow don't then I'm sure something will since there a lot of movies to go through still.
15533.title: Still More Disney Movies

info.brief_description: You end up in a Disney Move. And it seems to have a odd effect. A "growing" effect.
info.description:
After watching a Disney Movie the reader (you) somehow find yourself inside of said movie. And for some reason when you and a character get closer it seems to cause that character to grow bigger in size. (muscle only) So here are the rules.

1. Keep the interactions M/M.

2. Characters that grow are anthro only characters. So even though there are some animal based movie choices. Those animal characters must be anthros. Think of it as a alternate reality for those specific movies.

3. Use proper grammar and spacing please.

4. No gore or any kind of toilet stuff.

5. The only people who will react to the growth are the grown anthro male and human. (aka you the reader) So the respective world MUST adapt to the character's new size and act like they were always at their increased size.

6. Have fun.
